title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 8
itunes:title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 8
description:
Chad Millman and Simon Hunter of Action Network return to narrow down their favorite picks for NFL Week 8. Is now the time to buy on Kliff Kingsbury? Are the Texans a side worth taking? And can the Jets soars to new heights against the Patriots? #Volume #ColinCowherd #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
